channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: How are nuclear tests conducted? Why did humanity stop them?
A motorbiking ‘legend’ is now a suspect in the Louvre Museum heist. Who is Abdoulaye N?
Philippines typhoon death toll tops 100: Why is the country so disaster-prone?
Mexico’s Claudia Sheinbaum groped. How world's most powerful women are not safe
Inside Belem, the Brazilian city where world leaders will gather for Cop30
Why New York City's Zohran Mamdani can never become US president
Not a tactical ploy, Trump’s G2 framework represents a fundamental shift in US perception towards China
item.description: Washington now accepts Beijing as a peer power in sharing responsibility for global leadership, complicating India’s grand strategy.

item.title: How America’s tariff nationalism is wrecking its China strategy
item.description: Washington cannot rally the world against Beijing’s economic coercion while firing tariff salvos at its own allies

item.title: The new-age Jews of the West? When Hindu faith becomes a provocation
item.description: The call for Hindus to remain understated, invisible and compliant while celebrating their festivals, especially in foreign countries, is unsettling

item.title: China’s periphery diplomacy and the G2 chimera
item.description: It remains to be seen how China responds to attempts by the US to assert itself along China’s periphery, including in Pakistan, while paying lip service to a so-called G2

item.title: India-US defence deal confirms broader strategic picture beyond occasional setbacks
item.description: The recent India-US framework agreement is a significant step in strengthening bilateral ties and boosting industrial and technological cooperation in the defence sector. It affirms India as a priority partner in America's vision for a free and open Indo-Pacific

item.title: Head-on | Trump-Xi G2 duopoly is not the future world order
item.description: Indian policymakers and analysts are easily swayed by the optics around the US-China G2 duopoly. A closer look reveals how tenuous the G2 formulation is
